data.decision: Start TecArc agency project - creative + tech + AI services business with spouse
data.rationale: Combined skillsets (video/apps/automation + PM/AI images/photography/UGC) create strong value proposition. Target market: SMBs, e-commerce, wealthy individuals. Starting with full-featured agency website for credibility, lead gen, and service packages.
alternatives: Start with just one service vertical
Use existing platforms (Upwork, Fiverr) instead of own website
data.context: Husband-wife agency combining creative production, tech development, automation, and AI-powered content services.
